video_prompt: Woman's soft veil subtly shifts as her head tilts, eyes gently rising. Her lips softly part, a nascent sigh escaping. Light glints on delicate earrings as her clasped hands imperceptibly tighten. Slight blush deepens then fades on her cheeks.
image_prompt: A 3:4 portrait of a young, fair-skinned woman with blush, large brown upward-gazing eyes, and slightly parted glossy lips. She has dark brown hair. She wears a white, semi-transparent veil/shroud over her head and shoulders, with silver/white gold earrings. Her hands are clasped in prayer, with light pink nail polish. The background is an out-of-focus ancient stone architectural setting, with soft natural lighting illuminating her face and clothing. Digital art.
refined_video_prompt: Veil subtly shifts as head tilts, eyes gently rise. Lips softly part, a nascent sigh escapes. Light glints on earrings. Hands imperceptibly tighten. Blush deepens then fades on cheeks.
